TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName hat eine Modernisierung %s2_RouteName zerstört!

TEXT.English: A %s1_RouteName has been destroyed by a %s3_civ_adjective %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM1:Un:Una:Unos:Unas] %s1_RouteName [NUM1:ha sido destruido:ha sido destruida:han sido destruidos:han sido destruidas] - %s2_UnitName (%s3_civ_adjective).

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has failed to destroy the %s2_RouteName!
TEXT.French: Votre unité (%s1_UnitName) n'a pas pu détruire 1 %s2_RouteName !
TEXT.German: Eurer Einheit %s1_UnitName ist es nicht gelungen, die Modernisierung %s2_RouteName zu zerstören!
TEXT.Italian: [NUM1:Il tuo: La tua: I tuoi: Le tue] %s1_UnitName non sono riusciti a distruggere %s2_RouteName!

TEXT.English: Order the air unit to bomb the city, improvement or route in the selected tile
TEXT.French: Order the air unit to bomb the city, improvement or route in the selected tile
TEXT.German: Order the air unit to bomb the city, improvement or route in the selected tile
TEXT.Italian: Order the air unit to bomb the city, improvement or route in the selected tile
TEXT.Spanish: Order the air unit to bomb the city, improvement or route in the selected tile
